alert.note: Alert for Death Valley National Park; Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Owens Valley; White Mountains of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 13 at 1:57PM PST until February 15 at 10:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TUESDAY TO 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes, Owens Valley, White Mountains of Inyo County and Death Valley National Park. * WHEN...From 6 AM Tuesday to 10 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects or damage structures vulnerable to wind. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Periods of blowing dust will be possible, especially in the vicinity of dry lake beds.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Death Valley National Park; Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Owens Valley; White Mountains of Inyo County
